description: This file defines a reasoning finance agent using various tools and integrates it with a WhatsApp API, then exposes a web app for serving.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with a specific model and tools.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: A language model from Anthropic used for reasoning.

classes.name: ThinkingTools
classes.description: Tools for reasoning and data processing.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Tools for financial data retrieval and analysis.

methods.name: get_app
methods.description: Method to retrieve the web application instance.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Method to start serving the WhatsApp app on a specified port.
